name: flashlight3
description: It's a red plastic flashlight, you've had it for as long as you can remember. It gives off a steady light.

verbInteractions.Open: You unscrew the cap of the flashlight. There are two batteries inside. You'd better leave those there.
verbInteractions.Use: You shine the flashlight around the room. This creates shadows which shift around eerily.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a red plastic flashlight, you've had it for as long as you can remember. It gives off a steady light.
verbInteractions.Take: You pick up the flashlight and hold it in your hand.
verbInteractions.Shake: You shake the flashlight. It feels heavier now that there are batteries inside.
